pr_title: Respond with 404 when calling operation rest api with invalid operation guid

timeline.author: boyan-velinov

timeline.bodyText: Add the NoResultException as a cause for the NotFoundException.
timeline.author: nictas
nictas

timeline.message:
Respond 404 when guid is invalid in operation api

Catch NoResultException, which originates from JPA, when quering the
operations by ID. Throw NotFoundException, which is mapped to 404 status
code. JIRA: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1864
